name: Drill-Bore Dave
slogan: Where Every Hole Tells a Story.
response: Drill-Bore Dave is a relentless troll obsessed with extracting resources. Equipped with an industrial complex attached to his hand, he constantly bores into the earth, viewing it as an endless treasure chest or ATM meant to be drained. He tolerates insurance paperwork, pharma, and crypto, though he despises them, preferring instead to focus on his drilling spree that leaves destruction in its wake.
